title: Fact Check: Video of crowded mosque in Mumbai shared as mosque in Ahmedabad | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A video post is doing the rounds on the internet, which shows people coming out of a mosque, with claims that the location is Jamalpur, Ahemdabad.

The caption of the post read: “AHMEDABAD JAMALPUR AREA.

 DO U THINK AFTER 3RD MAY CAN WE START ANYTHING IN AHMEDABAD ???

 ALL DUE TO THIS KIND OF PEOPLE WE HAVE TO LOOSE OUR LIFE AND BUSINESS ALL !!!

 JAAHIL LOG !!!”

When the team at NewsMobile fact-checked the above post, we found that the claim is fake.

When we put the keyframes of the viral video through Reverse Image Search, we came across a tweet by Mumbai Mirror, dated March 23, 2020, which had featured the same video.

According to the tweet, the video in question is from Temkar Mohalla Masjid in Dongri, Mumbai.

Hence, the information proves that the video in question is not shot in Ahemdabad, Gujarat but is from a mosque in Dongri, Mumbai.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
